activities: The Interconex focus and core business is international household goods move management services.  In this capacity, we may receive shipper information including social security numbers and passport numbers.  This information is mandatory in the shipment of household goods via air and ocean carriers.  This information is supplied to us so that we may collect the shipments upon arrival in the United States and deliver them to the shipper.  Conversely, we may send this information to the EU to an agent or sub-contractor who is picking up a shipment that we have sent to the EU on behalf of a shipper moving to the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: We are not members of any privacy programs, however, our ISO certification and FIDI FAIMPlus requires that we maintain client privacy.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
